text: The Chavacano people (Chavacano: "mga Chavacanos") are one of the Filipino ethnic group in the Philippines, it is majority located in Cavite City, Luzon and in Zamboanga City, Davao City in Mindanao, The Chavacanos are the Chavacan speakers it is related closely into Spanish people and the Davaoe√±o people.https://www.geocurrents.info/blog/2016/01/29/chavacano-a-spanish-based- creole-language-of-the-philippines The other Chavacan also are used the languages of Cebuano and Tagalog. ==Reference== Category:Ethnic groups in the Philippines
title: Chavacano people
